exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameBackgroundSkin" width="640" height="1008" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="bg1" source="game_bg_jpg" x="0" y="0" width="642" height="1060"/>
	<e:Image id="bg2" source="game_bg_jpg" y="-1060" x="0" height="1060" width="642"/>
	<e:Image id="maskbg" source="pop_black_png" x="0" y="0" width="640" height="1008" visible="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameBoomEffectSkin" width="640" height="1008" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Group height="0" width="0" y="0" x="320">
		<e:Image source="loading_pic_jpg" width="374" height="383" id="img_boom" horizontalCenter="7" verticalCenter="443.5"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameBulletSkin" width="80" height="80" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="myBullet" source="my_bullet_png" x="4" y="0" width="70" height="79"/>
	<e:Image id="enemyBullet" source="enemy_bullet_png" width="67" height="62" y="9" x="6"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameMoveClipSkin" width="64	" height="64" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<ns1:MovieClipGroup id="movieClip" height="64" width="64" x="0" y="0" source="enemyRole"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GamePageOneSkin" width="640" height="1008" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="img_bg" source="page1_bg_jpg" x="0" y="0" width="640" height="1008"/>
	<e:Image id="img_xie" source="page1_xie_png" x="0" y="329" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image id="img_liu" source="page1_liu_png" x="435" y="240" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image id="txt1" source="page1_txt1_png" x="0" y="110"/>
	<e:Image id="txt2" source="page1_txt2_png" x="0" y="183"/>
	<e:Image id="txt3" source="page1_txt3_png" x="0" y="255"/>
	<e:Image id="txt4" source="page1_txt4_png" x="-16" y="323"/>
	<e:Image id="btn_big" source="btn_begin_png" y="598" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="btn_small" source="btn_begin_png" y="604" width="150" height="65" horizontalCenter="1"/>
	<e:Image id="img_time" source="page1_time_png" verticalCenter="404.5" horizontalCenter="0" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image id="sound_play" source="sound_pause_png" right="38" y="35"/>
	<e:Image id="sound_stop" source="sound_play_png" x="529" y="33"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GamePageThreeSkin" width="640" height="1008" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="page3_bg_jpg" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Image id="img_txt" source="page3_txt_png" x="0" y="50"/>
	<e:Image id="img_xie" y="224" source="page1_xie_png" x="162"/>
	<e:Image id="img_liu" source="page1_liu_png" x="133" y="187"/>
	<e:Group id="group_restart" height="63" width="145" x="59" y="885">
		<e:Image id="btn_bg" source="btn_bg_png" width="147" height="62" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Label text="再玩一次" fontFamily="微软雅黑" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="group_turn_big" y="885" width="180" height="63" x="428" visible="false">
		<e:Image source="btn_bg_png" width="180" height="62" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" id="btn_bg0"/>
		<e:Label horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" text="引爆惊天破" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textColor="0xE76A0C"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="group_turn_small" y="893" width="180" height="50" x="428" visible="false">
		<e:Image source="btn_bg_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="160" height="50" id="btn_bg1"/>
		<e:Label horizontalCenter="0" textColor="0xE76A0C" verticalCenter="0" text="引爆惊天破" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="26"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="group_turn_0" y="821" width="180" height="60" x="438">
		<e:Image source="btn_bg_png" width="180" height="60" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" id="btn_bg3" scale9Grid="17,17,133,48"/>
		<e:Label textColor="0xE76A0C" size="26" text="糯米抢票9.9" fontFamily="微软雅黑" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="group_turn_1" y="909" width="180" height="60" x="438">
		<e:Image source="btn_bg_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="180" height="60" id="btn_bg2" scale9Grid="15,17,134,45"/>
		<e:Label textColor="0xE76A0C" verticalCenter="0" text="猫眼抢票9.9" fontFamily="微软雅黑" horizontalCenter="0" size="26"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GamePageTwoSkin" width="640" height="1008" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="page2_bg_jpg" x="0" y="0" width="640" height="1008"/>
	<e:Image id="img_xie" source="page2_xie_png" y="113" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="img_liu" source="page2_liu_png" y="459" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="btn_select0" source="btn_select_png" x="540" y="197"/>
	<e:Image id="btn_select1" source="btn_select_png" y="526" x="540"/>
	<e:Image id="btn_start_big" source="btn_go_png" y="856" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="btn_start_small" source="btn_go_png" y="864" horizontalCenter="0" x="10" width="140" height="50"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GamePlayerInfoSkin" width="640" height="160" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="name_bg_png" x="0" y="0" width="640" height="160"/>
	<e:Image id="manIcon" source="man_lqy_png" x="50" y="14"/>
	<e:Image id="manName" x="189" y="68" source="name_chejiawei_png"/>
	<e:Image source="name_majin_png" y="67" x="213" id="manName0"/>
	<e:Image x="363" y="105" source="blood_bg_png"/>
	<e:Group id="group_blood" height="15" width="130" x="363" y="104">
		<e:Image source="blood_png" y="4" x="10" id="blood0"/>
		<e:Image id="blood1" source="blood_png" x="32" y="4"/>
		<e:Image source="blood_png" y="4" x="54" id="blood2"/>
		<e:Image source="blood_png" y="4" id="blood3" x="76"/>
		<e:Image source="blood_png" y="4" x="98" id="blood4"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image source="life_words_png" x="361" y="77" width="68" height="36" scale9Grid="8,4,55,28"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GamePopupSkin" width="535" height="350" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="pop_bg_png" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Group height="74" width="297" y="56" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Label id="txt_score" text="您的最终得分为 99 分" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textColor="0xFF750B" bold="true" size="34"/>
		<e:Label text="恭喜获得评级" fontFamily="微软雅黑" bold="true" id="txt_score0" x="26" y="93" textColor="0xFFFFFF"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group height="70" width="45" x="345" y="121">
		<e:Image id="sss1" source="pop_s_png" x="0" y="0" rotation="0"/>
		<e:Image id="sss2" source="pop_s_png" y="0" rotation="0" x="30"/>
		<e:Image id="sss3" source="pop_s_png" y="0" rotation="0" x="62"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="btn_turn" source="pop_btn_png" y="208" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameScoreIconSkin" width="150" height="80" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="tenNum" source="score_0_png" x="5" y="5" width="55" height="70"/>
	<e:Image id="singleNum" x="59" y="5" width="55" height="70" source="score_0_png"/>
	<e:Image id="word" x="103" y="20" width="55" height="70" source="score_fen_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameTimeIconSkin" width="125" height="125" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="time_bg_png" x="0" y="0" width="125" height="125"/>
	<e:Image id="tenNum" source="time_3_png" x="26" y="46"/>
	<e:Image id="singleNum" source="time_0_png" x="55" y="46"/>
	<e:Image source="time_s_png" x="79" y="52"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameLoadingPageSkin" width="640" height="960" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Label id="loading_number" y="824" height="30" fontFamily="黑体" size="20" text="已完成0%" textColor="0xFF4300" x="280"/>
	<e:Image id="img_boom" source="loading_pic_jpg" y="254" width="374" height="383" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Label id="loading_text" text="炸弹安装中..." y="768" height="30" fontFamily="黑体" size="28" textColor="0x978282" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image source="loading_time_bg_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="img_time" source="loading_time_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>
